is a small typical fishermans village of some 3.000 people, which gives access, by boat, to the Olmos Estuary in the Manglares El Morro refuge. Some truly amazing mangroves and the biggest delta of on the Pacific coast of South America.

value: ) - After an hour sailing you will arrive at an island populated by the biggest frigate bird colony in the world with about 8000 birds. It will be possible to walk in the middle of the nesting areas without scaring these, just like on Galapagos.
